website_summaries.verdict: An in expensive grow light that can easily clip to a variety of surfaces.
pros: If you have limited space, this compact grow light is your best option
The sturdy metal clip easily attaches to the edge of a windowsill or shelf, and the dual-head design can provide light for multiple plants
cons: Some customers found the brightness level inadequate

customer_reviews.title: SImple, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far - remote is simple to use - lets you choose between red, blue, or combined lighting. I know blue is good for vegetative growth, red is for flowering, and both together make a more powerful full spectrum light. The combined light appears a pink-ish tone. even with both on, the light is not all that bright - im sure it will help my small succulents and delicate indoor plants. The adustable arms are easily placed, and don't feel too flimsy. the clip is plastic, and is not quite as strong as I'd hope, but gets the job done. This light would work great for african violets.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Starting seeds for my garden
customer_reviews.text: Before spring I like to start the seeds for my garden, so that they when the weather is warm enough I have seedlings to start my garden with. The LED grow light is nice and durable, the led lights are nice and bright. The clamp holds on tight to the tables edge. The light has a timer, where ican have the light on for 3, 9 or 12 hours a day. I can choose red, blue or combination of red and blue color and adjust the brightness from 10% to 100%.
customer_reviews.author: ronald j gamache jr

customer_reviews.title: I'm actually getting results I love!
customer_reviews.text: definitely different i love how its has a clip to hang over my plants i also love how it keeps my plants room temperature I love the color changer and timer that it will go if when need be even if im not around just set and go... The dual head indoor plant light also allows you to dim the light or brighten it if necessary, its perfect for me even on cloudy days with this light my plants still get the required love and light to grow. i love how you can adjust to your needs any way you like I definitely will be purchasing a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Plants thriving!
customer_reviews.text: So living in South Dakota you don’t always have the greatest lighting for plants, in addition I don’t have a south facing window so it’s very hard to keep plants alive. I bought a few of these lights in hopes that I could change my dying plant situation. I am excited to say that I think there is a noticeable difference in the condition of my plants! They seem to be thriving instead of dying so I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Y.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product to fit my plant needs
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy for this product. We love having plants in the house but have a hard time finding places to put our plants that will get sunlight within the house. This light has been great with its 3 different light settings and then its timers to help me set it and forget it. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for some good light sources.
customer_reviews.author: Bill N.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lights! It saved my plants from ruin and I plan to buy more!! After just one day, my plants came back to life. Plus the timer is great! You set it the first time and it comes on everyday without having to turn it back on or off
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It works amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty and useful. The most important thing is the timer. I have been using for a month, I am happy with but so far. I will update this review if something change in it.
customer_reviews.author: yendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice light but mine broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Light worked great for about 3 months, my plants loved it. Then today I noticed the light was very dim. I tried to switch it off and on or switch colors, but the buttons dont work anymore. I was very happy with this product, but I expect even a cheap light to last at least one year.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: I'm digging this light.
customer_reviews.text: So far this light has been great for my house plants. I did notice the bendy arm not quite staying where I placed it, but over all I'm really liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Natcat

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, then after two months, it stopped. The controls froze up and the switch is hot, and the lights are dim. I can't even turn it off, I had to unplug it and there is a slight humming sound. Super disappointed because now my plants are not thriving!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor grows
customer_reviews.text: I love this small little grow light, it is the perfect size for my tiny little herb garden and the lights are great. The only issue i seem to have is the arms can be a tad bit flimsy. I might end up buying another 2 to really have some strong growing power
customer_reviews.author: Kenya E. Green

customer_reviews.title: It works great for me and my plants !
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this for quite a while. Couldn’t find a better option so I gave in with little hope of it arriving or working and my looking for return instructions. It works great. Timer is set so I don’t forget. Plants are happy. This is about 3 weeks in on ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Game fun

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Compact base so it doesn't take up a lot of valuable table/ desk space. Flexible arms make it easy to adjust. Now just wait to see how the plants like it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Plants anywhere in the house!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this I can keep my plants growing in rooms with no sunlight! And it’s not an eye sore either!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. It has a timer option, different brightness options and also different color lights.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: I love this product I have learned how to give the plants what helps and the instruction
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and really want another and great price
customer_reviews.author: Emma Egbuna

product_meta.title: Indoor Plant Light with Red and Blue 20W LED Light Bulbs - Grow Light with Timer for Indoor Plants, Houseplants, Succulent Plants - Greenhouse, Table, Desk Lamp with Clamp (Two Adjustable Heads)
product_meta.description:
Size:Two Adjustable HeadsLove plants, but don’t necessarily have the time to keep chasing after the sun for them?

Houseplants improve our focus and indoor air quality. However, they’re not always the easiest to keep alive. As most plants need sunlight to survive, owners are tasked with constantly looking for the best window to give them the most light. Not always the easiest, given each plant’s individual needs.

And when winter comes, many have to cycle plants between periods of staying inside and in the garden. These high maintenance costs can be off-putting, especially for us who love flora but are also stacked with work or kids.

Now you can finally go green effortlessly with the Plant Light by Dwelling with Pride.

Growing lights for indoor plants allow you to grow plants year round. From germination to maturation and flowering, our UV light for plants supports healthy growth.

The blue light drives photosynthesis, and helps the plant properly regulate water and carbon dioxide. Blue light is what helps the plant grow strong stems and leaves. Red light helps chlorophyll maximize yield and grow nutritious fruits or flowers by helping the plant metabolize the light it receives into sugars and carbons.

However, overexposure is a real problem with some grow lights for indoor plants. Too much blue light can stunt growth. Too much red light can lead to overly long leaves and stems. Dimmable settings and an auto timer ensure that your plant gets light at the exact wavelength it needs.

Not convinced yet? Here are more benefits you get with our plant lights for indoor plants:

Quality adapter for reliable power supply.
Metal clamp with sturdy grip.
Max power at 30w.
Each light good for two plants.
Nip your lighting problems in the bud. Grow the vibrant plants you’ve always wanted with Dwelling with Pride’s Plant Light TODAY!
feature_bullets: FULL SPECTRUM CARE - Our full spectrum LED grow light uses red and blue lights--a necessity for plant growth. The plant lamp has 3 combinations: red light, blue light, and red and blue light.
ADJUSTABLE INTENSITY - Features dimmable brightness for all 2 lights. You can use our light with any plant, whether they’re sensitive with dim light needs, or plants that need a lot of light.
FLEXIBLE RANGE - Triple lights are attached onto gooseneck arms that rotate 360° degrees. Our LED grow light is also built with a metal clip that easily mounts onto the edge of desks or tables.
LONG-LASTING - LED lights are best known for their longevity, and are a cut above CFL, fluorescent, or halogen lights. Each plant grow light has an average lifespan of 50,000 hours.
